name: Jungle Hero 2
description:
You will play as a jungle hero, to go to the monster-infested alien base to defeat the bosses. The earth is waiting for you to liberate, go!

W jump, A/D forward/backward, Q/E release skills, left mouse button to shoot.

If you like this game, you can support me. Your support will guarantee my subsequent updates. Also you are welcome to give your valuable opinions. 😉
